}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This model has a full-height bracket and 2x 2dBi dipole antennas.
Variants:
*[[HiRO H50320]] - [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01GCK2E96 Amazon] - Half-height bracket and 2x 2dBi dipole antennas *[[HiRO H50323]] - [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01GCL0RBM Amazon] - Full-height bracket and 2x 5dBi omnidirectional antennas w/5ft. cords
[[Category:English Documentation]]
